original_text: And he said to the disciples, “The days are coming when you will desire to see one of the days of the Son of Man, and you will not see it.
korean_text: 또 제자들에게 이르시되 때가 이르리니 너희가 인자의 날 하루를 보고자 하되 보지 못하리라

sentences.original_text: And he said to the disciples,
when you will desire to see
one of the days of the Son of Man,
and you will not see it.
